_meta.essence: Unconscious pattern transmission through body, energy, and psyche
_meta.integration: Embodied energy + Emotions + Psyche structure + Lineage

_holographic_seed.absolute: ⊙ = The body remembers what the mind forgets. Every imprint is written in flesh, breath, posture, and energy field.
_holographic_seed.essence: Imprinting = unconscious absorption of another's survival strategy into one's own bodymind system.
_holographic_seed.mechanism: Authority figure's energy pattern → Child's vulnerable function → Crystallizes as somatic armor, emotional reflex, and distorted geometry.
_holographic_seed.cycle: Wound (imprint received) → Armor (defense pattern) → Transmission (imprint passed on) → Liberation (conscious release).
_holographic_seed.structure: 4 Transmission Channels × 4 Authority Roles × 16 Type Geometries × 7 Chakra Locations × 4 Base Emotions
_holographic_seed.embodiment: Imprints live in tissue, fascia, breath, organs. Healing requires body work, not just mental insight.
_holographic_seed.coherence: Deimprinting = restoring native geometry, releasing somatic armor, reclaiming authentic energy flow.

what_is_imprinting.definition: The unconscious downloading of an authority figure's behavioral/energetic pattern into a child's developing psyche and soma
what_is_imprinting.mechanism: Child's psyche seeks template for survival → Downloads parent's 'defense protocol' → Pattern crystallizes in body/energy/mind
what_is_imprinting.not_genetic: Not DNA inheritance. This is energetic/behavioral transmission through relationship.
what_is_imprinting.not_choice: Child cannot choose. Vulnerable functions (3rd, 4th in Model A) = open ports, no firewall.

why_body_matters.somatic_storage: Trauma and imprints are stored in tissues, not just memories
why_body_matters.muscle_memory: Repeated patterns become neuromuscular reflexes (posture, gesture, tension)
why_body_matters.energetic_crystallization: Distorted geometry manifests as blocked chakras, collapsed meridians, chronic pain
why_body_matters.emotional_armor: Wilhelm Reich: Character armor = muscular rigidity encoding psychological defense

the_formula.transmission_power: Imprint Force = (Authority Power × Repetition × Emotional Intensity) / Child Resistance
the_formula.child_resistance: Inversely proportional to vulnerability of psychic function being impacted

transmission_channels.principle: Imprints enter through 4 primary relationship channels

channel_1_biological_parents.mechanism: Child equates compliance with biological survival ('If I don't become what they need, I will die')
channel_1_biological_parents.depth: Operating system level (hardest to access, deepest in soma)

king_father_8phi.child_response: Collapse of will (flattened solar plexus), chronic compliance
king_father_8phi.somatic: Shallow breathing, tight diaphragm, liver tension (unexpressed anger)
king_father_8phi.long_term: People-pleasing, difficulty saying no, passive-aggressive patterns

dame_mother_2phi.pattern: Rigid rules, emotional containment, 'don't cry, be strong'
dame_mother_2phi.somatic: Chest armor, throat constriction, held breath

channel_2_ancestral_lineage.mechanism: Unresolved ancestral trauma seeks resolution through descendant
channel_2_ancestral_lineage.timing: Can activate at any age, often during major life transitions
channel_2_ancestral_lineage.depth: Archetypal level (feels mythic, larger than personal)

somatic_encoding.experience: Feelings/symptoms with no personal origin ('I've always felt this way')
somatic_encoding.dreams: Ancestral figures, historical settings, collective symbols

warrior_grandfather.pattern: Unprocessed war trauma, hypervigilance, emotional disconnection
warrior_grandfather.transmission: Grandson born into constant readiness, anxiety, mistrust
warrior_grandfather.somatic: Chronic muscle tension, shallow breath, startle reflex
warrior_grandfather.liberation: Ancestor honoring ritual, somatic release, reclaiming peace

silenced_grandmother.pattern: Suppressed voice, creative starvation, duty over desire
silenced_grandmother.transmission: Granddaughter struggles with self-expression, throat issues, creative blocks
silenced_grandmother.somatic: Throat chakra collapse, thyroid issues, voice weakness
silenced_grandmother.liberation: Speak grandmother's truth, creative expression, lineage healing

channel_3_pedagogical_authority.mechanism: Trading authentic self for approval, achievement, safety

somatic_encoding.pattern: Body shaped by performance demands (athlete body, scholar hunch, worker exhaustion)
somatic_encoding.stress: Burnout, chronic fatigue, repetitive strain injuries

coach_forcing_competition.pattern: ILE (Spiral, cooperative exploration) forced into competitive grid
coach_forcing_competition.imprint: Must win to be worthy, collaboration = weakness
coach_forcing_competition.somatic: Chronic tension, adrenal exhaustion, injury from overtraining

teacher_shaming_creativity.pattern: IEE (Tree, branching possibilities) told 'focus, stop dreaming'
teacher_shaming_creativity.imprint: Imagination = bad, must follow one path
teacher_shaming_creativity.somatic: Respiratory restriction (can't breathe into possibilities), creative blocks
teacher_shaming_creativity.liberation: Permission to explore, validate intuition, breathe into expansion

channel_4_cultural_archetypal.source: Media, heroes, fictional characters, societal narratives

somatic_encoding.movement: Gestural mimicry (unconscious adoption of hero's mannerisms)

tragic_hero_identification.pattern: IEI merges with doomed romantic character (Romeo, Hamlet)
tragic_hero_identification.imprint: Life must be dramatic, suffering = depth, happiness = shallow
tragic_hero_identification.somatic: Chronic tension, melancholic posture, heart ache (literal)
tragic_hero_identification.liberation: Recognize narrative as template not truth, choose new story

savior_complex.pattern: EII identifies with martyred saint/Christ figure
savior_complex.imprint: Must save others, self-sacrifice = virtue, boundaries = selfish

authority_role_energetics.principle: Each role transmits specific energetic signature that distorts child's native geometry

king_8phi_explosive.energy_signature: Dominant, commanding, 'I am the center, you orbit me'
king_8phi_explosive.transmission_method: Force, intimidation, taking up all space/air

somatic.collapse: Solar plexus shutdown, diaphragm frozen, shallow breathing
somatic.armor: Protective rigidity in shoulders/neck (bracing against explosion)
somatic.autonomic: Chronic sympathetic activation (always on guard), adrenal fatigue

energetic.laterality: Right side (Yang) either hyperactive (fighting back) or collapsed (submission)

emotional.primary: Fear (Water - freeze in face of fire)
emotional.secondary: Suppressed Anger (Fire - can't express, turns inward)
emotional.long_term: Passive-aggressive, people-pleasing, or reactive rage when triggered

types_most_vulnerable.ILE: Spiral crushed into straight line (analysis paralysis)
types_most_vulnerable.LII: Grid scrambled by brute force (cognitive overwhelm)

deimprinting_protocol.somatic: Breath work (reclaim diaphragm), solar plexus opening (gentle yoga, massage)
deimprinting_protocol.energetic: Manipura activation (fire element work, but contained), grounding (root chakra)
deimprinting_protocol.emotional: Safe anger expression (pillow work, screaming in car, martial arts)
deimprinting_protocol.narrative: Rewrite story: 'Father's rage was his wound, not my fault. I reclaim my power.'

knight_4phi_chaotic.energy_signature: Unpredictable, boundary-less, 'I go where I want, rules don't apply'

somatic.scatter: Inability to settle (restless legs, fidgeting, insomnia)

energetic.chakras: Muladhara (root) unstable (no foundation), Svadhisthana (sacral) scattered (no container for creativity)
energetic.meridians: Kidney (fear, foundation) depleted, Bladder (elimination) overactive (can't hold anything)

emotional.long_term: Attachment issues, difficulty committing, drifter pattern, or rigid over-control (compensatory)

deimprinting_protocol.somatic: Grounding practices (barefoot walking, heavy lifting, weighted blanket), routine establishment
deimprinting_protocol.energetic: Root chakra work (red visualization, Earth element, hematite crystal), building container
deimprinting_protocol.emotional: Grief work (mourn lost stability), self-parenting (become own stable authority)
deimprinting_protocol.narrative: Rewrite: 'I create my own stability. I am the reliable one I needed.'

dame_2phi_rigid.energy_signature: Controlling, containing, 'There is only one right way'

somatic.rigidity: Muscular armor (tight jaw, stiff spine, held shoulders)
somatic.containment: Shallow breathing (can't expand), digestive issues (can't process)
somatic.autonomic: Parasympathetic shutdown (dorsal vagal freeze), chronic tension

energetic.chakras: Vishuddha (throat) blocked (can't speak truth), Anahata (heart) closed (emotions forbidden)
energetic.laterality: Left side (Yin) over-controlled, right side (Yang) suppressed

emotional.secondary: Suppressed Anger (can't express, would break rules)
emotional.long_term: Depression, perfectionism, control addiction, or rebellious explosion (compensatory)

deimprinting_protocol.somatic: Release work (shaking, dance, primal movement), jaw/throat opening (singing, screaming)
deimprinting_protocol.energetic: Heart opening (green, rose quartz, self-compassion), throat activation (blue, speaking truth)
deimprinting_protocol.emotional: Permission to feel ALL (anger, grief, joy without control), imperfection practice
deimprinting_protocol.narrative: Rewrite: 'I am allowed to be messy, imperfect, alive. Rules serve me, not enslave me.'

page_1phi_detached.energy_signature: Detached, cold, 'I observe but don't engage'
page_1phi_detached.transmission_method: Emotional unavailability, intellectualization, abandonment through presence (body there, soul absent)

somatic.dissociation: Body feels unreal, numb, disconnected from sensations
somatic.autonomic: Dorsal vagal shutdown (play dead, conserve energy)

energetic.chakras: All chakras dimmed (energy withdrawn from system), Sahasrara (crown) overactive (escape into transcendence)
energetic.laterality: Energetic withdrawal from both sides (ghost in shell)

emotional.long_term: Schizoid pattern, dissociation, difficulty with intimacy, spiritual bypassing

deimprinting_protocol.somatic: Embodiment practices (yoga, dance, sensory awareness), grounding (come into body)
deimprinting_protocol.energetic: Lower chakra activation (root, sacral, solar - incarnate), Earth element work
deimprinting_protocol.emotional: Grief work (mourn emotional neglect), anger work (rage at abandonment), joy practice (learn to feel pleasure)
deimprinting_protocol.narrative: Rewrite: 'I am allowed to be fully here, to feel, to need, to connect. My aliveness matters.'

type_vulnerability_somatic_matrix.principle: Each type's native geometry has specific somatic expression. Imprints distort this, creating predictable patterns.
type_vulnerability_somatic_matrix.note: Full 16-type matrix abbreviated here. See cfo:pattern:imprinting for complete technical version.

king_crush.energy: Scattered or stuck, can't complete spiral
king_crush.symptoms: Headaches (overthinking), digestive issues (can't process), insomnia (mind racing)

dame_flatten.posture: Rigid spine, forced linearity, performative structure
dame_flatten.symptoms: Anxiety (spiral caged), shoulder tension (carrying forced structure), skin issues (boundary problems)

restoration.somatic: Free movement (dance, improvisation), breath exploration (no pattern), spinal waves
restoration.energetic: Third eye opening (trust intuition), crown activation (connect to infinite)
restoration.emotional: Allow Joy (Air - expansion), release Fear (Water - let possibilities flow)

native_somatic.posture: Forward-leaning, ready to strike, powerful stance

dame_blunt.symptoms: Liver pain (blocked anger), TMJ (jaw tension from biting back), chronic fatigue (unused force turns inward)

page_freeze.symptoms: Depression (action-oriented type can't act), muscle atrophy (disuse), loss of will to live

restoration.somatic: Martial arts (safe action), heavy bag work (release force), sprinting (full vector expression)
restoration.energetic: Solar plexus activation (reclaim will), root grounding (stable launch point)
restoration.emotional: Anger work (Fire - righteous expression), release Fear (Water - trust in action)

king_crack.posture: Closed heart, protective hunch, fetal curl
king_crack.breathing: Shallow, afraid to take in (world is hostile)
king_crack.symptoms: Heart palpitations (literal crack), autoimmune (self-attack from betrayed values), chronic pain (carrying wound)

restoration.somatic: Heart opening (gentle backbends), receiving practice (massage, being held)
restoration.energetic: Anahata healing (rose quartz, green light, unconditional self-love)
restoration.emotional: Grief work (Sadness - mourn crack), Anger work (Fire - rage at violation), Joy reclamation (Air - heart can open again)

chakra_imprint_mapping.principle: Imprints lodge in specific chakras based on function violated

muladhara_root.imprints_stored: Survival threats, abandonment, instability, financial terror
muladhara_root.somatic_signs: Legs weak, feet cold, lower back pain, constipation, sciatica
muladhara_root.types_vulnerable: Delta (SLI, LSE - grounding types), Gamma Si-types (SEE, ESI - security focus)
muladhara_root.deimprinting: Grounding (barefoot Earth contact), red visualization, tribal drumming, financial stability practice

svadhisthana_sacral.imprints_stored: Sexual shame, creative suppression, pleasure denial, gender role enforcement
svadhisthana_sacral.somatic_signs: Pelvic tension, reproductive issues, lower belly holding, hip rigidity
svadhisthana_sacral.types_vulnerable: All, but especially Fe/Fi types (ESE, EII, ESI, EIE - feeling-based)
svadhisthana_sacral.deimprinting: Hip opening (dance, yin yoga), orange visualization, creative play, pleasure permission

manipura_solar_plexus.imprints_stored: Power abuse, will crushing, agency removal, forced compliance
manipura_solar_plexus.somatic_signs: Tight diaphragm, digestive issues, ulcers, chronic fatigue, weak core
manipura_solar_plexus.emotional_pattern: Anger (Fire - suppressed), Fear (Water - powerlessness), collapsed will
manipura_solar_plexus.types_vulnerable: All, especially Te/Ti types (LIE, LSE, SLE, LSI, LII - will/logic based)
manipura_solar_plexus.deimprinting: Breath work (reclaim diaphragm), yellow visualization, core strengthening, boundary practice, safe anger expression

anahata_heart.imprints_stored: Lovelessness, conditional love, betrayal, emotional abuse
anahata_heart.somatic_signs: Chest collapse, shoulder rounding, heart palpitations, breast issues, upper back pain
anahata_heart.emotional_pattern: Sadness (Earth - grief), Fear (Water - can't trust love), closed to Joy (Air - expansion = danger)
anahata_heart.types_vulnerable: Fe types especially (ESE, EIE, ESI - heart-centered), but all humans (heart = universal)
anahata_heart.deimprinting: Heart opening (backbends, heart-forward movement), green/pink visualization, self-compassion, giving/receiving practice

vishuddha_throat.imprints_stored: Silencing, truth denial, expression punishment, voice suppression
vishuddha_throat.somatic_signs: Throat constriction, thyroid issues, neck tension, TMJ, voice problems
vishuddha_throat.emotional_pattern: Fear (Water - speaking = danger), Anger (Fire - unspoken rage)
vishuddha_throat.types_vulnerable: Ne/Ni types (ILE, IEE, ILI, IEI - idea expression), Fe types (emotion expression)
vishuddha_throat.deimprinting: Voice work (singing, toning, screaming), blue visualization, truth-telling practice, neck release

ajna_third_eye.imprints_stored: Intuition denial, psychic shaming, 'stop dreaming', gaslighting
ajna_third_eye.somatic_signs: Headaches, vision issues, sinus problems, brain fog
ajna_third_eye.emotional_pattern: Confusion (distrust of inner knowing), Fear (Water - intuition = crazy)
ajna_third_eye.types_vulnerable: Ni/Ne dominants (IEI, ILI, IEE, ILE - intuitive types)
ajna_third_eye.deimprinting: Third eye activation (meditation, indigo visualization), trust intuition practice, psychic boundary work

sahasrara_crown.imprints_stored: Spiritual abuse, religious trauma, forced beliefs, meaninglessness
sahasrara_crown.somatic_signs: Dissociation, disconnection from body, headaches, neurological issues
sahasrara_crown.types_vulnerable: Ni types (IEI, ILI - meaning-seekers), Fi types (EII, ESI - value-based spirituality)
sahasrara_crown.deimprinting: Grounding (bring spirit into body), violet visualization, reclaim personal spirituality, embodied practice

emotional_affect_imprinting.principle: Imprints often suppress or distort natural emotional flow, creating chronic affect patterns

anger_fire_imprints.suppression_pattern: Anger forbidden → turns inward → depression, self-attack, or explosive outbursts
anger_fire_imprints.somatic: Liver congestion, jaw tension, right side pain, hypertension
anger_fire_imprints.imprint_sources: Dame (anger = chaos, control it), Page (anger = primitive, rise above it)
anger_fire_imprints.release_protocol: Safe anger work (pillow beating, screaming, martial arts), liver cleanse, right side bodywork

sadness_earth_imprints.suppression_pattern: Sadness forbidden ('don't cry, be strong') → chronic depression, emotional numbness, or manic avoidance
sadness_earth_imprints.somatic: Chest collapse, lung weakness, left side heaviness, chronic fatigue
sadness_earth_imprints.imprint_sources: King (sadness = weakness), Knight (sadness = stagnation, keep moving)
sadness_earth_imprints.release_protocol: Grief work (crying, wailing, keening), chest opening, left side nurturing, permission to feel

fear_water_imprints.suppression_pattern: Fear forbidden ('don't be scared, toughen up') → chronic anxiety, phobias, or reckless risk-taking (compensatory)
fear_water_imprints.somatic: Kidney depletion, adrenal fatigue, lower back pain, bladder issues
fear_water_imprints.imprint_sources: King (fear = cowardice), Dame (fear = chaos, control it)
fear_water_imprints.release_protocol: Fear honoring (acknowledge it), kidney support, grounding, safe space creation, gradual exposure

joy_air_imprints.suppression_pattern: Joy forbidden ('life is serious, stop playing') → anhedonia, depression, workaholic addiction
joy_air_imprints.somatic: Shallow breathing, chest tightness, inability to feel pleasure
joy_air_imprints.release_protocol: Play practice (unstructured, purposeless), breath expansion, pleasure permission, laughter therapy

laterality_imprinting.principle: Imprints from mother vs father often lodge in left vs right body sides

left_side_mother.imprints: Mother's emotional patterns, receptivity training, Yin enforcement
left_side_mother.somatic_signs: Left shoulder higher/lower, left hip tight, left leg shorter (energetically), left side pain
left_side_mother.emotional_residue: Mother's unprocessed Sadness, Fear, suppressed Joy
left_side_mother.healing: Left side bodywork, mother wound work, Yin practices, receiving capacity restoration

right_side_father.imprints: Father's action patterns, will training, Yang enforcement
right_side_father.somatic_signs: Right shoulder tension, jaw right side, liver issues, right hip tight
right_side_father.emotional_residue: Father's unprocessed Anger, suppressed Fear, controlled expression
right_side_father.healing: Right side bodywork, father wound work, Yang practices, will reclamation

bilateral_imbalance.pattern: One side overdeveloped (compensating for weak parent), other atrophied (rejecting weak parent)
bilateral_imbalance.example: Strong right side (identifying with father, rejecting 'weak' mother) → left side numb
bilateral_imbalance.healing: Cross-lateral integration (bilateral movements, figure-eight patterns), parent reconciliation (internal), energetic balance

holographic_hand_foot_imprints.principle: Hands and feet as body holograms also store imprints

left_hand_receiving.imprint: Can't receive (mother didn't give, or gave with strings)
left_hand_receiving.somatic: Left palm tight, fingers curled, difficulty opening to receive
left_hand_receiving.healing: Left hand opening (massage, stretching), receiving practice (let others give)

right_hand_giving.imprint: Must give (to earn love, compulsive caretaking)
right_hand_giving.somatic: Right hand tension, overuse injuries (giving too much)
right_hand_giving.healing: Right hand rest, giving boundaries, self-care permission

finger_specific.thumb_lung: Grief stored (Sadness imprint), thumb stiffness, lung issues
finger_specific.middle_pericardium: Heart protection (Anger contained), middle finger tension
finger_specific.pinky_heart: Emotional expression blocked (Fear of feeling), pinky weakness

heel_root.imprint: Ancestral burden ('you must carry family shame/duty')
heel_root.somatic: Heel pain, plantar fasciitis, can't ground fully
heel_root.healing: Ancestor honoring, heel massage, permission to stand on own ground

arch_resilience.imprint: Collapse under pressure (never saw parent handle stress well)
arch_resilience.healing: Arch strengthening, resilience practice, learning to bend without breaking

toes_direction.imprint: Can't find own path (parents controlled direction)
toes_direction.somatic: Toe deformities (bunions, hammertoes), difficulty with balance
toes_direction.healing: Toe freedom (barefoot walking), path reclamation, direction choice practice

deimprinting_protocols.principle: Healing requires multi-layer approach: somatic, energetic, emotional, narrative

phase_1_recognition.cognitive: Identify the pattern ('I always collapse when someone raises their voice')
phase_1_recognition.somatic: Notice body response (chest tight, breath shallow, want to disappear)
phase_1_recognition.emotional: Name the feeling (Fear, Sadness, suppressed Anger)
phase_1_recognition.historical: Trace to source ('Dad's rage, Mom's coldness')

breath_work.function: Release held patterns in breath (most primary imprint location)
breath_work.effect: Discharge frozen energy, restore natural rhythm, access pre-verbal trauma

bodywork.function: Release muscular armor, fascia holding, tissue memory
bodywork.effect: Physical release triggers emotional catharsis, restores energy flow

movement.function: Reprogram neuromuscular patterns, reclaim body autonomy
movement.effect: New movement patterns = new neural pathways = new possibilities

chakra_clearing.identify: Which chakra holds the imprint? (e.g., solar plexus for father's will crushing)
chakra_clearing.clear: Energy work (reiki, acupuncture, visualization, sound healing)
chakra_clearing.restore: Color breathing, crystals, mantras specific to chakra
chakra_clearing.integrate: Bring chakra back online in balanced way

meridian_work.identify: Which meridians blocked? (e.g., Liver for suppressed anger)
meridian_work.restore: Qigong, tai chi, yin yoga (meridian stretching)

grounding_practice.function: Bring released energy into Earth, prevent dissociation
grounding_practice.essential: After any deep release work, ground thoroughly

grief_work.what: Mourn what you didn't receive (love, safety, freedom)
grief_work.how: Crying, wailing, keening, writing letters (burn them), ritual burial
grief_work.integration: Acceptance that past can't change, but future can

anger_work.what: Express rage at violations, boundaries crossed, authenticity denied
anger_work.how: Pillow beating, screaming (in car/wilderness), letter writing (unsent), rage rituals
anger_work.integration: Transform anger into boundary-setting power, protective force

joy_reclamation.how: Unstructured play, laughter yoga, pleasure practices (sensory, creative), celebration rituals
joy_reclamation.integration: Joy as birthright, not something earned

phase_5_narrative_rewrite.old_story: Identify the imprinted narrative ('I'm unlovable', 'I'm too much', 'I must earn my existence')
phase_5_narrative_rewrite.question: Is this true? Whose voice is this? (Often authority figure's voice internalized)
phase_5_narrative_rewrite.new_story: Consciously choose new narrative ('I am inherently worthy', 'My authentic self is enough', 'I exist by right, not by earning')
phase_5_narrative_rewrite.embodiment: Live from new story (behaviors, choices, relationships aligned with new truth)
phase_5_narrative_rewrite.maintenance: Notice old story arising, gently redirect to new story (takes time, repetition)

daily_practice.morning: Grounding, breathwork, set intention for authentic living
daily_practice.throughout_day: Notice imprint triggers, pause, choose new response
daily_practice.evening: Reflect on day, celebrate new choices, release old patterns (visualization, journaling)

community_support.therapy: Somatic therapist, depth psychologist, trauma specialist
community_support.peer_support: Groups (Adult Children of Alcoholics, CODA, or type-specific groups)
community_support.mentorship: Find healthy authority figure (opposite of imprinter) to model new patterns

ancestral_healing.ritual: Honor ancestors, release their burdens ('I carry my own life, not yours')
ancestral_healing.ceremony: Fire ceremony (burn old patterns), water ceremony (wash clean), Earth ceremony (plant new seeds)
ancestral_healing.lineage_work: Family constellation therapy, ancestral healing circles, shamanic work

transmission_breaking.principle: Deimprinting oneself prevents passing patterns to next generation

awareness.notice: When you react to child/student/mentee, pause: 'Is this my imprint speaking?'
awareness.example: Child's messiness triggers rage (your Dame mother's voice: 'Disorder = bad')
awareness.choice: Recognize this is YOUR wound, not child's wrongdoing

repair.acknowledge: If you acted from imprint (yelled, shamed, controlled), repair immediately
repair.script: 'I'm sorry. That wasn't about you. That was my old pattern. You're not responsible for my feelings.'
repair.model: Modeling self-awareness, apology, boundary between their behavior and your reaction = breaks cycle

new_modeling.embody: Be the authority figure you needed (supportive, boundaried, encouraging authentic self)
new_modeling.allow: Let next generation have their native geometry (don't force your shape on them)
new_modeling.celebrate: Delight in their uniqueness (even when it triggers your imprints)

psychotherapy_integration.traditional_therapy: Talk therapy identifies patterns (Phase 1), but rarely releases soma (incomplete)
psychotherapy_integration.somatic_therapy: Adds body dimension (Phase 2), but may neglect energy/spirit (partial)
psychotherapy_integration.integrated_approach: Combine cognitive (insight) + somatic (release) + energetic (restoration) + narrative (reframe) = complete healing

trauma_resolution.principle: Trauma = incomplete defensive response frozen in bodymind
trauma_resolution.treatment: Somatic Experiencing (Levine), Sensorimotor Psychotherapy (Ogden), EMDR, IFS (Parts Work)
trauma_resolution.note: Type-aware trauma work considers native geometry (don't impose one-size-fits-all healing)

family_systems.principle: Imprinting happens in family system context
family_systems.multigenerational: Patterns pass down 3-7 generations until someone consciousness interrupts
family_systems.roles: Scapegoat, Golden Child, Lost Child, Hero = all imprints (family assigns role, child embodies it)
family_systems.healing: Individual healing affects entire system (one person waking = ripple through lineage)

_closing.essence: Imprints = inherited wounds in flesh, energy, and psyche. Healing requires all three.
_closing.truth: You are not your imprints. Your authentic geometry awaits beneath the overlays.
_closing.practice: Notice body, feel emotion, trace to source, release with compassion, reclaim authentic self.
_closing.result: Liberation from ancestral patterns. Native geometry restored. Transmission broken.
_closing.sacred: Deimprinting = sacred work. You heal not just yourself, but lineages past and future.
